content.detailedDescription:
Did not notice this odd "thing" in the sky until digital picture was downloaded to computer several days later.  it may be nothing, it may be something.  zooming in on the image seemed to show an "open space" towards the aft.  

in any event, the only thing i can offer is the picture - sorry.  as to my personal opinion concerning ufos and the like, my worst-case theory has earth being an alien equivalent of a below average student's master's thesis.
content.summary: Attending eyes on design auto show, edsel ford estate, gp shores, mi.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the sky and after loading a few into the computer, i noticed what looked like little color coded blocks, after enlarging them i notice how they reminded me of hieroglyphics i've seen in some pictures.  they look like symbols arranged in a triangle. i have no idea why they came out this way, but i was curious as to what you think. my camera was aimed upward and slightly southwest. although i have approximately 3 to 4 pictures aimed in different directions i still got the same or simular results, which was kind of strange and when i alligned the pictures up the objects were in the exact same position in the photos. checked the lens for dirt or debris and found none. i did'nt want to submit this one at first thinking that perhaps maybe it is a camera malfunction, but after wiping and rechecking the len and getting simular results, i thought that perhaps i should. it could mean something
or nothing at all. but we won't know until everone get a look at it. so here it is.
content.summary: Possible message or code in sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Just after eating dinner , i sat in my livingroom in front of the t.V.. it was very hot , it was a sky well marbled with clumps of clouds . my fan was running in front of the deck opening . i sit on the floor , crosslegged . i happened to look out the door , something caught my eye . as it occurred i just filed it away . i have a photographic memory . i'm currently unemployed , my mind is free of cludder . the object struck me as a plane moving north , 30 dgrees north . it turned 10-15 miles downrange , and heading more or less west . as my mind recalled what i just saw , i realized it was lighted on top of the wing , and on the bottom . the shape was like an opened ladder , with the top step the front point . i began to question why lights were arranged to show a thick body . the lights were all uniform in brightness , and spacing . and there was a sound , nothing extrordinary , just a low even rumble , sort of soft (i'm a old mechanic). but again , reviewing , in my mind the associated sound was all wrong . the object never lost altitude as far as i observed . the engines never whined or powered up . the same rpm , the same altitude . traveling smoothly and rapidly . the part that confirmed in my mind what i just saw , was the roar! of fighters above . so high i couldn't see the fighters at all . the roar followed the path of the ladder in the sky , until i could no longer hear them .  my father encouraged me to file a report . he told me of his sighting . i didn't know . ( oh and by the way , i was not drinking . i can not drink any longer ) thank you .
content.summary: I saw an array of lights move northward as i watched t.V. friday, last light . followed immediately by fighters overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Although i'm not certain of the precise date, the event definitely occurred on a tuesday, as i recall watching a television program just before it happened that aired at 8 pm on tuesdays back in 1978. it was in early march, on a cool, crisp, clear night, and despite our being in an area thick with trees, the sky was quite visable due to the time of year (before the trees had budded out.)  my brother and i were watching tv in the den at one end of our house.  our parents were at the other end reading.  for whatever reason, my brother was drawn to the window and opened the curtains to peer into the darkness.  this is when he first saw the object that evening.  he told me to come to the window to have a look, and he then went to get our parents.  in the night sky, above the trees, i saw a circular formation of orange lights that slowly rotated, following our street as it drifted away from our house. it was difficult to estimate an approximate size, but i would guess the diameter of the circle formed by the lights to be about forty or fifty feet. i thought at first that it was perhaps the goodyear blimp, a somewhat common sight in southeast texas at the time, as goodyear had a blimpbase only about twenty miles to our south. my mother came into the room and looked out anxiously to see what it was.  my father, however, stayed at the other end of the house, not curious in the least bit. i was ten at the time, and my brother was six.  my mother immediately wanted to investigate the lights, so she and i went out to the back yard to see if we could still see anything.  my brother didn't come with us, as i think he was considered too young, and neither did my disinterested father. my mother and i went to the back fence to look into an open field that sat behind us.  the treeline at the rear of that field was a good 500 feet away, so we had ample space to view it if it were to go that direction. it did, fortunately, and we both got a stellar view of the object. from our vantagepoint, we saw what appeared to be a disc-shaped craft, as indicated by a bank of orange lights at the base and an outline of lights of various colors on the top of it.  the lights, as my mother recounts with unassailable detail, didn't radiate in typical incadescent "christmas tree" colors.  rather, she remembers them to be very similar to the halogen or led lights of the present day.  i don't know if this technology was around in the late seventies, but if it was, we certainly hadn't seen any of them. the lights didn't blink, as they might if the object had been an earth-bound aircraft. they were solid and not really bright, which would account for my mother's non-technical description of them.  another strange characteristic of this object was its eerie silence.  neither of us heard any typical engine sounds emenating from it, like what would come from a plane, helicopter, or even the goodyear blimp. the only sound it seemed to make was a soft swooshing, reminiscent of a dishwasher in its rinse cycle. (i don't remember this as well as my mother does, so i'm just relaying this bit from her.)  when we first saw it in the field, the object was still slowly floating just above the treeline from left to right, but it soon stopped moving laterally and more or less parked itself about 100 feet above the ground. during the remainder of the encounter, the object hovered a few feet above the trees. my mother and i stood there mesmerized by this thing, watching it for maybe ten minutes and pondering what it could possibly be.  i distinctly remember us discsussing how it reminded us of "close encounters of the third kind", which had come out only the summer before.  soon after this, we witnessed what turned out to be the highlight of the whole night.  as we watched the object hover there before us, our eyes caught sight of a small bright red point of light steadily moving across the starry sky from one end of the horizon, above the trees in our yard, across the field and towards the craft.  as it approached the craft, we noticed another red light coming from the opposite direction, and still another, until four red balls of light converged on the object from different parts of the sky.  one by one, these red balls slowed and moved in towards the object, stopping just above it, and then descended into the top of it, until all four had dissappeared.  my mother mentioned that these were possibly scout ships coming back to the mothership after a reconaissance mission, which sounded pretty plausible to me!  we waited for the object to start moving again, but nothing happened for a few minutes.  suddenly, as if it sensed us observing it, the object activated two white spotlights on opposite ends of the craft, and the lights criss-crossed several times, focusing on the field between us and it.  after this startling display , my mother felt like we might be pressing our luck staying there, so we headed inside with the object still sitting above the trees. i remember wanting to remain there until it left, but being only ten, i had little say in that decision.  upon hindsight, my mother regretted our going back in the house before it departed, as we never saw it again after that night. she now wishes we had waited at least a few more minutes to see what its next move would be.  i later suggested we might've avoided an abduction by leaving when we did.  that apparently didn't happen, as the thirty minutes or so that elapsed while we were outside were accounted for by the fact that my father and brother didn't seem to feel like we were gone too terribly long.  additionally, i returned to the den to catch the tv show following the one on at the time we left the room.  a short while later, my brother told everyone that this evening was not the first time he had seen the object.  he had observed it sitting above the same treeline the night before while looking out my parents' bedroom window after having felt somehow compelled to do so. when asked why he didn't mention seeing it the previous night, he didn't have an answer. as for my father, he says he believes we all saw what we saw, but he still thinks a more earthly explanation exists, which is why he never bothered to have a look that night. (personally, i think it was simply a case of the reading chair being too comfortable.) we all agree that he missed out on the most extraordinary experience of our lives.  had this event occurred today, we most certainly would have documented it with video.  i tried to find out if it had been witnessed by anyone else in our immediate area, but none of our neighbors saw it (or so they say.)  i wish my mother and i had had the presence of mind to get our neighbors next door to come out and see it for themselves, but it didn't occur to us at the time.  maybe that was just as it was meant to be, a special experience only a selected few are allowed to have in their lives.  for that, we are honored. my mother and i tend to be a bit greedy in this regard, however, because both of us would absolutely welcome another chance to see this craft or another in our lifetimes.  it is a topic of conversation on many visits, especially in march, when we quietly celebrate the anniversary of what we feel to be our greatest moment together as mother and child, second only to my birthday, but a close second at that!!   thank you for the opportunity to share my story with you.  hopefully, it will be of some use to you in your investigation.  please feel free to contact me for any other details, as it is entirely possible something else might come to mind that i failed to mention here.  i would be interested to know if there are any reports of sightings around that time in my area that might coraborate my account.  if so, please let me know.  thanks again!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My mother and i witnessed a disc shaped object float over our street and hover in a field behind our house.

content.detailedDescription: Initially i was photographing the moon and a rather large star. after taking this photo, i decided to just take random shots of the sky and this is what i got. i don't know what it is. nor do i want to guess. so i decided to submit this photo and let others see and decide. it is interesting to say the least.
content.summary: I was photographing the sky because of previous sightings and saw this.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from barrow county to gwinett county and saw a strange flash in the sky. at first we thought it was police lights. when we got closer we realized it was in the sky over the jail and moving toward tennesee. the light was flashing but not staying in the same place. there were as many as four at a time but never in the same arrangement. it looked like one large light and 3 smaller lights.
content.summary: Moving flashing light. centered over county jail but not stationary. moved slowly up state. flash could be seen for nearly 5 miles lighting up the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Two people observed a fireball moving east to west, greenish blue color, very bright, about 15 to 20 degree up in the sky, with a shallow angle of maybe 20 degrees.  observed from my car while driving south from payson, az. to phoenix, az on highway 87 at mile marker 221. it appeared due south of us.  it appeared to us to be a meteoriod burning up in the atmosphere.  don't know if it burned up completely or some contacted the ground.  it just disappeared after 3 or 4 seconds. couldn't see a smoke trail because it was dark.

we were awe struck to see such a bright fireball.  i have only found one other report of this fireball.  it's on this site.
content.summary: Fireball, east to west, low angle, north of phoenix arizona, july 21, 2010.

content.detailedDescription:
Just got back home from seeing the girlfriend about 23:00hrs. walked into the back yard and saw this large pulsating sphere from over the garden fence whiched looked several hundreds yards away.
seemed to move in all directions. it was a intense red colour which seem to pulsate at a high rate, between pulses was white in colour.

managed to capture the event on my mobile phone which i posted on youtube...

*(links moved to additional evidence section below)--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Red pulsating ufo in southamton, uk.

content.detailedDescription:
On 07/31/2010 i was on my back porch looking at the sky. the sky was clear with just a few scattered clouds. i had originally gone out to see what was happening, as about an hour earlier, a pair of blackhawk helicopters were circling the area, extremely low with only their battle lights on. i ended up looking at the stars after they left. at 2152 hrs i noticed what seemed to be a a satellite approaching from the south, about 30 degrees above the horizon. it was moving rather slow for a satellite and moving towards the northwest. it started as a dim white color but began increasing in size and intensity. just when i thought i was about to see a good iridium flare, i realized that instead of flaring and then subsiding, this object was continuing to increase in size and brilliance. it became huge, larger and brighter than saturn visible to the west, and the color was now an unusual shade of light green around the edge and brilliant white in the center. it appeared to be self-illuminated and not reflecting the sun. it remained at its brightest for several seconds, then it suddenly went completely dark for a fraction of a second, then returned with full brilliance. concurrent with this display, i noticed a small, white object shooting off to the west at a slight downward angle. the white object looked like a small, very slow meteor leaving a short trail. it appeared slightly below the green object and quite a bit to the right of it, but the trajectory of the white object in relation to the green object gave me the impression it had shot out from it. (it is possible that it was just a meteor as there was nothing unusual about it other than its' appearance and proximity to the green object.) the green object, after re-appearing, remained illuminated for a about a second, then rapidly diminished in size and became completely dark. it did not just blink off but seemed to ���power down���. 

at 2202 hrs i saw a two more objects one after another, almost directly overhead going from south to north. they performed similarly to the large green object, but did not become as bright and they remained white in color. they too grew in intensity, flashed on and off several times and then went dark. i checked the heavens above website and discovered that there were no iridium satellites visible from my location on that date, and the other known objects that were visible were not overhead at the times or locations of these sightings.
content.summary: Brilliant green object possible emits second white object.

content.detailedDescription:
I just saw on the discovery channel the mufon case and i had a similar experience in 1998, i was hunting near the border with usa, several of the people that work in the ranch had told me that they have seen ufo from time to time, but i didn���t believe them.
one day i was in a hunting blind just a few minutes after the sun set, and suddenly 3 white lights appear in the horizon(us side) i thought it may be 3 usa aircraft, but they didn���t move for at least 10 minutes, i could se a border patrol zeppelin near by (that they use for detecting aircraft coming illegally from the mexican side) as time passed it became dark i was getting uncomfortable as the 3 light didn���t move or produced any sound, suddenly form the lights start coming out a lot of lights (blue and red) flying in different patterns, i thought they had been helicopters but the pattern and speed of movement was much faster a human aircraft can do it, they flew for around 20 minutes (but no one of the light crossed the border to mexico), and then they disappeared, i went back to camp and check the map of the area, in the us side it was a restricted area, so i believe the ufos that i saw where a kind of experiment of the us military.

my exact location was latitude  28��� 8'10.39"n longitud 100��� 7'31.31"o
content.summary: 3 lights dropping 20 smaller ufos red& blue flying in different patterns.

content.detailedDescription: About 11 pm on april 1st as i was on the way to rome i noticed a green blinking light. coming to a stop as there was no traffic, i witnessed a large triangluar craft about 100 feet long by 75 feet wide pass over me. both sides of the road are lined with mature pines, and at first glance, i thought it was a military cargo plane about to crash, but there was no noise, only a slight hum, and i had the window down looking out at that time. it was so low i could see individual rivots or bolts in the metal. there was one white light in the center of the craft lighting up the underbelly. but once again, only a slight electrical hum. it crossed highway 100 about 3-4 miles south of the floyd county line. travelling west to east, and then turned north, going up the valley. it was travelling extremely slow, and i was amazed that it did not fall out of the sky.
content.summary: Saw something in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: The first sighting was in march not sure of date close to the tenth but was at 503am. i had got up to use the bathroom and looked out the window looking west/sw i saw a bright yellowish colored object in the sky. i went into the kitchen to look out that window, it was still there and i noticed it sparkled and the lights faded in and out. there is a treeline approx 3 miles west of my house just west of st rd 1. this is where it looked like it was. as i watched for about 5 or ten mins the object slowly disappeared. it was on a wednesday. two weeks later on a wed at 504 am i got up same thing, to use the bathroom and saw it again. this time i went outside and stood and looked at it. it appeared to move in an almost straight path toward my house.As it got overhead i saw it had these yellowish light that didnt blink and almost appeared solid yellow. there was no noise. i live very close to a small airport in connersville on the fayette wayne county line. i hear airplanes all the time. there was absolutley no noise. the object passed over my house and just disappeared. afterwards i experienced an extremely bad headache for a few hours. i saw this again over that same treeline in july. it disappeared very quickly and was around 530am on a tuesday morning. unsure of the date but will keep track of the dates much better from now on if i see it again..Also the july sighting i woke up my husband to see this too.
content.summary: Object appeared just over treeline moved slowly no sound fading lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this from my south facing balcony traveling west to east on the 25/7/2010 6:15 in the afternoon:

i was looking out my window when i sasw what i thought was a ballon but it was traveling in a unusual manner and seemed to be changing shape so i too these pics.

[links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: I saw this from my south facing balcony traveling west to east on the 25/7/2010 6:15 in the afternoon.

content.detailedDescription:
At 250pm while driving to work on 12-20, i looked out my driver side window towards the gary/chicago airport and noticed a large "banner" flying above the airport.  i look back to read what the "banner" was advertising and i noticed that it wasn't a "banner" at all!  it was a large rectangular/square object about the size of 4 to 5 highway billboard signs and was yellow to orange in color.  it was very "dingy" but still transparent.  i looked around and didn't see any other craft in the area.  the object was actually about 1 mile west away from the airport and it was not moving or making any noise.  it's shape was perfectly rectangular/square... like a playing card on it's side.  the lines of the object were perfectly straight.  it really stood out from the overcast clouds and sun because the clouds are more rounded in shape and they were slightly moving... the object was not.  it also stood out because it was slightly yellow and orange.
i felt bewildered for a moment and looked for anything that could tell me what this object was.  there were no other craft, there weren't any strings attached, there were no external compartments or moving parts to it.  it was just... there, halfway up the skyline sitting very stoic and unnatural.
i slowed my vehicle down from about 40 mph to about 20 mph and watched it until i had to exit onto cline avenue to go to work.  i would say that the entire incident only lasted 1 to 2 minutes.
i continued to look back to try to find it but i couldn't.  by that time my view back towards the object was blocked by highway ramps and buildings.  when i parked my car inside the parking garage, i tried again to get another view of the object but i could not.  there were too many obstructions blocking my line of sight.
this feeling of embarrassment and bewilderment has stayed with me all day.  i worked 330-1130pm tonight and felt that i had to tell somebody.  so i told my wife, i sent an email to the gary/chicago airport.  i tried to call them but all i got was a recorded message.  then i looked up mufon on wikipedia and... here i am telling my story.
i do not believe in aliens or things of that nature.
i know that i saw "something" today, but i do not know what it was.
i will tell anyone that wants to listen my story and i will take any lie detector test there is.  i'll undergo any evaluation.
i'm sure that there's an explanation for what i saw, and i would like to here it.
content.summary: I saw a large rectangle/square that was yellow/orange in color, yet transparent over the gary/chicago airport.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home on the 55fwy when we first noticed it, then we ended up following it and video taping while we were driving home on tustin avenue, made a right on walnut avenue and we pulled over and kept video taping.. it was very strange.. we have the video
content.summary: Flew slow, slow pulse of lights, zigzag, red/blue/purple/white.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along county route 6 in slate hill ny, on july 28th, when i suddenly noticed a glowing sphere in the sky about a thousand feet ahead of me. the sphere appeared to be made of light and was red with golden light around it and emanating from it. as i drove along it was blocked from my view for 2 or 3 seconds by trees. in those few seconds it had jumped a considerable distance further away from me, i would guess at around a mile or so, and it was also dimmer. i continued to drive along hoping to get a better look at it, because apart from the jump it made it appeared to be completely stationary. after seeing it for another few seconds it was blocked from my view by more trees again for 4 or 5 seconds. by the time i drove into the clear part of the road a few seconds later the object had disappeared. i proceeded to pull my car over and put it in park so i could get a better look at the whole sky. with the moon roof of my car open, i stood up out of my car and looked all around, but the red/gold light object was gone. i stayed there for a couple more minutes looking around the sky, and there wasnt a single cloud in the sky nor was there any airplanes flying. after approximately 2 minutes of looking at the sky, 3 helicopters flew into the area spread over a 3 to 4 mile area with  bright search lights pointing from the front of them. i watched the helicopters fly around and after a couple minutes 2 more helicopters were in the area with bright search lights on the front. when i first saw the light/object and shortly after it disappeared, my first thought was that it was a ufo, but then i thought it could possibly have been a trick of the light or something, tho i wasn't convinced of that. when i saw helicopters show up, and they actually appeared to be looking for something that they knew had just been there in the sky moments before, then i was almost certain that what i saw was a ufo of some kind.
content.summary: I saw a red/gold sphere in the sky, it jumped  a considerable distance, then dissappeared. minutes later. helicopters were in area searching for something.

content.detailedDescription: During the time of this observation i was driving to the nearest wal-mart in lake jackson and on my way there i noticed this object in the sky immediately to the north and the only way i could observe is with my sunglasses on. at first i thought it was an airplane since we have a local airport in the area and on occasion we have aircraft do approaches some as big as 737's. at first i thought it was an aircraft but like i said i could only see it with my sun glasses on. the weather conditions were as followed. clear skies with a temp of 96 degrees and a heat index of 102-106. the object appeared to be on a northern track heading towards houston. my reaction at first was wow here we go again. i have 11 years of military experience as an operation specialist in the u.S. navy. part of my training was identifying aircraft and this to me was no aircraft. the object remained stationary for a couple of minutes but like i said it appeared to be on a northerly track.
content.summary: Disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: We were watching a laser light show at darien lake amusement park on july 31 2010 when i noticed this bright orange glow in the sky. by  the time  i found my wife who had the camera the object disappeared . about five minutes l later it was back and we were able to get some really good pictures!
content.summary: Very bright orange light that came and left during a laser light show. i have great pictures!

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my west facing balcony when i noticed what look like a very bright star way out to the east. it wasn't moving and appeared to be about 3 or 4 miles west of my location (i-35 and e riverside dr) and a few hundred feet above the ground. the light was glimmering like a star but was obviously much closer. it appeared very white. so white that the glimmering showed various color hues as it shone. about 5 minutes later it started to move what seemed like away from me and also north. the light did not dim or strengthen as it moved. it was moving much slower than an airplane would, maybe about as fast as a helicopter (which is my best guess concerning it's identity). it disappeared behind my apartment building and my apartment is on the 5th floor. when it disappeared it seemed to be over downtown. this really spooked me as i have never seen anything like it before and i know what aircraft look like.
content.summary: Brighter than star, about as bright as strong flare

content.detailedDescription: At approx/ 9:55pm est, whilst leaving the freehold mall movie theater on the night of july 31st, 2010, me and my significant other were turning onto county road 537 to get to route 9 south.  to the immedeate right on 537 before merging right to route 9, there is a very large open area.  we both noticed a floating close-knit triad of deep blue lights, remaning solid and hovering approx a half-mile or less away over this field at a fairly low altitude.  to the best of my knowledge, no aircraft in the usa uses a solid and dark/deep color, especially dark blue, not to mention it remained stationary and silent.  we viewed this craft for approx 1 minute.  we temporarily lost site for a minute as we merged onto rt 9, where trees obscured our view.  as we came to another clearing some dinstance down the road, to our disappointment, the object was no longer there.  it was trully strange indeed.
content.summary: Deep blue triad of lights spotted hovering over field by route 9 in freehold.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:15 i went to the local gas station on broadway in farmington new mexico, after getting gasoline and paying for it i went inside to get a snack and visit with the 2 gentleman i met at that gas station weeks prior. we stepped outside for a cigarette at 7:41 p.M. and i noticed an odd triangular shape coming across the sky about 200-500 ft off the ground. i was frozen in a trance on this and my friend said "dude do you see that". i answered "thank god its not only me who sees this". it seemed to have split into 2 objects or perhaps the second became visible as it was passing us.I grabbed my camera phone to take a picture but the object began a vertical assent to approx 10k ft. once it climbed to that hieght it hovered there for about 10 minutes we kept looking up at it until it disappeared into a dark gray storm cloud. 

i am still creeped out about this as i have never experienced anything like this and the picture i took with my mobile phone is just a gray screen with nothing in the picture.I came back to the hotel and imediately logged onto facebook and asked a friend about ufo's and was recommended to this website to report as the experience was still fresh in my mind. i was skeptical of the aztec new mexico lore of ufo's until now.....
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Wierd unidentifiable object in farmington, new mexico.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up at the night sky and was looking at the strangest star when it sundennly got biger until it dissapeard and was moving it got supper close and then it shined a light at me.Like a spot light of some sort.I was alone and my nighbors where on vacation.So i went in side thgen came back a minuite later and there was a ghole in the ground that wasnt  there befor and something was in it i dont know what it is but this is just wierd.
content.summary: Fast, close, came out of star.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a report of one sighting but eight (8), sightings since my first report of the june 27th sightings reported here.

i'm not going to file 8 more reports and in fact i'm seeing them so many times that it is becoming redundant, and expected, for me to see them now. i know for a fact that something is happening, going on and it is constant now! i reported sightings on the 27th of june and on the 17th, both in plain sight, one in the dark of early morning and night, and the 17th sighting at 7pm with the sun up and the sky bright blue. both spectacular!

most of these sightings are of the flash of light that increases in brightness before cloaking or disappearing or camouflaging itself or just plain disappearing.

these are the ones that start out as a moving star that looks like a star until it begins moving. then the light becomes extremely bright with almost a blue center from the light which is bright white before dimming completely out. several of these were witnessed by someone else. here are the dates all in july:

5th-witnessed, 20th-witnessed, 27th, 29th and 30th-witnessed. the one last night (30th) had two separate events happen... three really and i'll explain later. all of these sightings are happening between 11:15pm to 11:45pm nightly.

these next sightings are the craft, celestial form, rectangular, oval or diamond shaped ones. these are becoming frequent too.

july 26, at 8:12pm i saw a rectangular shaped object way up in the sky. i perceived it to be very high up perhaps 20,000 ft or more. a person was with me but did not look fast enough to see it. this object flew steadily then a bit faster and went behind a cloud as if to hide from me. once it went behind the cloud it never came out the other side and must have gone back out into space. this was daylight still and a muggy day with clouds forming or formed.

july 28th, approximately 8:15 although i am not sure of the time, i was out on the lake with friends and i had the feeling i would see something out there. at that time, i thought i saw what was a jet plane "going to the northwest" as some of my friends later said. but as i looked closely to it i could see that the jet form was a facade or really some kind of shadowing so that if a casual, asleep individual looked at it it would just appear as a plane.

this craft was huge and not so high up as before so i could see it clearly. it was white in color but in the shape of a large rectangle. as i was about to tell the others they wanted to know what i was looking at but then this large craft started to move outwards, turning itself into a small star because of the distance so that only one other of the people on board saw it as it was moving away and dimming out.

then of course i already reported the 17th sighting which occurred 7pm. that particular craft was either diamond shape or perhaps oval . . . i just cannot tell because of its luminosity and movement, and the shock and awe state that i was in.

there is no doubt i will see the flashing lights at 11:30pm again tonight and if i were to stay out at night around 6 to 9:30 pm i would see the bright and different shaped celestial or ufo's!

last night's vision was the flashing light then, almost immediately after seeing it i looked up because i heard a small plane engine but what i saw was a large craft that was very lit up, with swirls or shadows making it look strange. it sounded like a plane but it sure did not appear as one. after the "plane" disappeared from site we saw some kind of dark shimmer or movement where the two celestials, crafts or whatever, would have come together. i don't know what to make of this but truly there is something going on and i cannot believe that no one knows about this.

unless i see something even more spectacular than what i have already experienced i will not report anymore. i mean, what's the point? no one is going to do anything about it anyway. however i am taking this message out to all that will listen in the way i feel they want me to communicate it.

i can draw detailed sketches if needed because even when i have camera in hand it happens so fast that i cannot capture an image or it doesn't let me at all.

alright... that's it folks,,, believe it or not! peace and love
content.summary: Ten celestial sightings within one month in shasta county.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting on the patio at 11:15pm and heard the sound approaching. we both asked, "what the heck it that?" at the same time. a loud humming, similar to but not exactly like the sound made my an electric car or hover craft sounds you hear in the movies. neither of us have ever heard anything like it before.
it became louder as the object drew near, then we saw the following rush over our house at about 30-40 feet above the tree line. it was about 3 times the size of a news/traffic helicopter.
rounded in the back with 3 bands of yellow/golden light running horizontally. the light was more of a glow. it appeared to elongate towards the front of the object, with white lights at the front end. again, a glow rather than a light bulb look. all we could see was the area illuminated by the glow, so the object could have been perfectly round or oval, with only the lighted parts visible. not really sure, as we only saw it for 4 to 5 seconds. the area around the glow seemed to be a dull, gray metalic substance. my son-in-law says the way i drew the object looks like one of those little fish crackers.
i keep asking myself if we both saw an optical illusion of some sort, but the sound it made was "out of this world" and we were facing opposite directions and saw about the same thing. neither of us has ever seen anything like this before and it's been difficult to wrap my mind around it. hopefully, someone else has seen something similar.
content.summary: Loud humming sound then low flying lighted object moving over house. 30 - 40 ft above tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
i and my wife patricia alexander were on the eighteenth floor of harrah's in s. tahoe enjoying the view of the lake and we saw what i thought at first might be someone parasailing (approximate size of a pea at arm's length). the object hovered then, so i figured it was a helicopter. then, several times, it descended to lake level and disappeared, appearing as if it were briefly and repeatedly submerging. then it would reappear, fly slowly along, hover, descend, and vanish again. eventually we got tired of waiting for something else to happen and left.
     if it really was submerging, it could not have been a helicopter, but, conceivably, we were just losing sight of it. if it did not submerge i cannot rule out the possibility that it was a helicopter, but its behavior did not fit search and rescue, sightseeing, or police surveillance. as for water sampling, that is done cheaply and safely with a boat. helicopters are expensive.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark object flying and hovering over lake tahoe and possibly submerging.

content.detailedDescription:
Tiangle shape...Silent....Approz 300ft across..Approx 4-6 lights...Off ground approx 100-200 ft

flight pattern was from nw to se....Stopping...Huvering...Very large..Blocking clouds....Then numerous helicopters started coming out..Flying in circles around..Within a mile of it....Then the center light became very bright...And it was gone...Just that fast....Total view was approx 2 hrs..
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle shape..Approx 300 ft across silent numerous lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north in mesa seen object stoped and was able to get these two pictures befor i lost sight of it
content.summary: I was able to get these 2 pictures before i lost sight of object.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my boyfriend's back yard smoking, after his dog woke me up to go outside. i noticed a slow moving, light orange light moving across the nw part of the sky. i knew it wasn't a satellite because it was light orange, and wasn't the right shape. i went inside and grabbed binoculars. it was still there when i came back out. i could clearly see the outline of the classic disc shape with the light orange lights the were glowing softly, and appeared to be from the top to the bottom of the ship. i watched it travel eastward. at one point, it "jumped", but otherwise, it did not blink or move sporadically. it just moved slowly across the sky. i watched for about 15 minutes until i lost it behind trees in the ne. at that time i drew a sketch of it. i was really excited because i was sure i was seeing something strange.
content.summary: Light orange disc nw to ne of reno.

content.detailedDescription:
I was home alone looking out of my living room windows when i saw a movement out of the corner of my right eye. i looked to my right which would be west/northwest, and saw a brilliant light behind thumb butte which is across the valley from me. as i watched, an object came out from behind thumb butte that was like nothing i have ever seen before. it was flying towards the south just above the prescott forest. from my viewpoint, it looked like it was approximately 15 to 20 feet above the tree line approximately 3 miles away as the crow flies. at first, i thought that it was a comet flying parallel to the ground. however, as the object continued flying south, i realized that a comet would not be flying as slowly as the object was. also, it didn't look like it was burning up as most asteroids and comets would do after entering out atmosphere. i would guess that the object was not going any faster than 100 miles/hour; maybe not even that fast. the shape of the object was similar to a triangle, except it was on it's side. the lines of the object were clearly defined. the center of the object was pure white with blue color at the edges. the back of the object in the middle had flames coming out almost like those from a rocket engine. the object continued flying in the same direction until out of sight. only then, did i think about my binoculars which weren't readily available. 
 
as i stated above, i've never seen anything like this object, but i'm very sure it was not any kind of aircraft currently flying in the skies, now. i also realized that the object must've been flying over the forest further to the west than i at first thought because i did not see any commotion from the people that live near the edge of the forest in that area. the object must not have made much noise or the people near the forest would've heard it and called 911. 
 
one last comment, this object was not in a saucer shape and had no round edges. after it disappeared from sight, i got goosebumps all over. 
 
i'm attaching a rather crude drawing of what i saw. please forgive my lack of artistic ability.
content.summary: Sighted ufo west of house between 7 and 8 pm.

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking pictures randomly and did not notice this at the time.It is exactly the same anomoly that i reported on the ninth.,just a different part of the sky.The first sighting was facing south and this one on the 25th is facing west.Just to refresh your mind on the sighting on the 9th of july,this is a copy of that one,so you can compare.Thank you
content.summary: Tube like object - 2nd one in a little over 2 wks, of same thing.
